comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The Speaker of the Tanganyika Legislative Council, the Hon A Y A Karimjee, OBE, making a statement to the Council in the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam.  It may have been at the time of the Constitutional Conference in March 1961.  The figure on the left is the Clerk to the Council, Mr C E Fenwicke-Clennell.
